DOC.brief_title: The Effect Diet Learning Abilities Children Kindergarden
DOC.detailed_description: Positive effect n-3 long chain polyunsaturated fatty acid ( PUFAs ) , provide fatty fish intake , cognitive function widely accept , far clear evidence randomize intervention study child young adult , although fish intake positively associate cognitive function observational study . The main aim study test effect diet improvement cognitive performance kindergarden child age 4-6 year . In intervention study , child randomly allocate two group , one consuming prepared meal herring mackerel four month , one group consume meal contain meat control group . The child ( n=200 ) consume prepared meal three time week . Cognitive performance child test study start end use Wechsler Preschool Primary Scale Intelligence ( WPPSI_III ) nine hole peg test . Children screen mental health problem Strengths Difficulties Questionnaire ( SDQ ) , global measure child 's mental health . Compliance monitor documentation study fish intake measure fatty acid status . For detailed investigation effect increase herring mackerel intake , intervention blood urine collect lipidomic analysis ( metabolite ) , vitamin D iodine determination genotyping ( fatty acid metabolism inflammation ) .
DOC.criteria: Being 46 year old . Sufficient command Norwegian language child participate cognitive test child parent comply study requirement accord investigator estimation . Known food allergy
